title: Data Analyst @ CoPilot AI
subtitle: Sept 2024 - Dec 2024 • Worked on AI-driven product strategy & UX improvements.
details: Partnered with Growth Marketing, Product, and Design teams to analyze user behavior trends, providing insights that optimized onboarding flows and increased activation rates by 15%.
Built automated dashboards in Snowflake and Tableau, to track key business metrics, reducing manual reporting time by 30% and improving decision-making speed across teams.

title: Associate Product Management Intern @ CoPilot AI
subtitle: Jan 2024 - Aug 2024 • Worked on AI-driven product strategy & UX improvements.
details: Launched a user blocklist management feature: Conducted 20+ user interviews and iterative A/B tests to validate the solution, reducing unwanted interactions by 52% and saving ~$115K annually in operational costs.

Integrated AI-driven meeting tracking and sentiment analysis: Collaborated with engineering and design to deliver the feature, increasing the North Star Metric by 26% and driving measurable user engagement growth.
Streamlined account migrations: Designed and deployed an intuitive dashboard, cutting engineering overhead by 20% and reducing miscategorized issues by 40%, preventing ~$140K in potential losses.

title: Program Assistant @ Decoda Literacy Solutions
subtitle: Assisted program manager in managing an IRCC-funded provincial literacy program.
details: Coordinated program logistics and communications.
Developed program evaluation metrics.
Managed relationships with program partners.

title: Co-President @ SFU Blueprint
subtitle: Blueprint is an international student-run organization that provides tech solutions to non-profits pro-bono.
details: Spearheaded four major tech projects, leading scoping and user research with 120+ participants, delivering 85% of the feature set and achieving high satisfaction.
Established product management processes in Blueprint, including ticketing, mentoring new PMs, and creating documentation, boosting project delivery timelines by 30%.

title: Web developer & Research Assistant @ Rosie Robotics Lab
subtitle: Built and investigated ASR datasets leading to a publication.
details: Developed a React-based validation tool with AWS and DynamoDB, automating the verification of 3,000+ audio files and improving dataset accuracy for emotion classification models.

Conducted data annotation and ASR model fine-tuning (Whisper Large, Wav2Vec 2.0) to enhance speech-to-text transcription, reducing Word Error Rate (WER) and Character Error Rate (CER) while improving model robustness.

title: Incoming Editor in Chief @  Canadian Undergraduate Journal of Cognitive Science
subtitle: Overseeing the publication process and guiding the journal’s research direction.

title: President @ Cognitive Science Student Society
subtitle: Elected with 90% confidence.
details: Led a team of 10 executives and 30 volunteers.
Organized 10+ events, including a research conference.
Managed the working budget for the soceity and journal.
